name: macos-notifications
description: Manage macOS notifications and Do Not Disturb via AppleScript
author: Example

command.description: Action to perform: 'toggle' switches Do Not Disturb mode, 'send' displays system notification

title.description: Bold header text for notification. Required for sendNotification command

message.description: Main body text for notification. Required for sendNotification command

sound.description: Play system notification sound when shown. Default: true (plays sound)

result.description: Operation result: DND state after toggle, notification delivery status, or error details if failed
